info.name: Analytics - Reports
info.description:
SAP Business ByDesign Analytics - OData Examples to access Reports
==================================================================

The SAP Business ByDesign OData API for Reports can be used to access SAP ByDesign reports. The API is tailored for remote access to pre-processed and formatted analytical data. The remote system may extract a ByD analytical model as a cube incl. semantics like key figures and language-dependent texts, or analytics result sets incl. aggregations and key figures.

This collection provides sample OData requests for the SAP Business ByDesign reports listed below.

Reports: 
- *Invoice Volume*
- *Complete Employee Overview: Key date*
- *Inventory Report*
- *Monitoring Purchase Orders*
- *G/L Accounts - Line Items*
- *Account Details*
- *All Current Access Rights*
- *Sales Order Volume Extended*
- *Accounts Receivable - Open Items*
- *Employee Lifecycle Events*
- *Planned Working Time and Absences*

Configuration: 
The SAP ByDesign business user requires access to the following SAP ByDesign work center views:
- *Customer Invoicing - Invoice Documents*
- *Personnel Administration - Employees*
- *Inbound Logistics - By Warehouse Request*
- *Purchase Requests and Orders - Purchase Orders*
- *General Ledger - Journal Entries*
- *Business Partner Data - Accounts*
- *Application and User Management - Business Users*
- *Sales Orders - Sales Orders*
- *Receivables - Customer Accounts*
- *Time Administration - Employees*

You may need to clear cookies stored in Postman to retrigger authentication using the correct SAP ByDesign user.

item.name: Select properties and aggregate key figures (BA)
Filter by report selection parameter of type datetime (BA)

query.value: PARA_CAL_DAY ge datetime'2019-01-01T00:00:00' and PARA_CAL_DAY le datetime'2019-12-31T00:00:00'
CIP_SALES_UNIT eq 'P1110' and PARA_CAL_DAY ge datetime'2019-01-01T00:00:00'
CDPY_BUYER_ABC eq 'A' and PARA_CAL_DAY ge datetime'2019-01-01T00:00:00'

item.name: Report: Complete Employee Overview: Key date
Get employee overview by key date

query.value: PAPA_PO_CREATION_DATE_STR ge datetime'2018-01-15T00:00:00' and PAPA_PO_CREATION_DATE_STR le datetime'2018-02-01T00:00:00'

item.name: G/L Accounts - Line Items | Filter by posting date and fiscal period

url.raw: https://{{TenantHostname}}/sap/byd/odata/fin_generalledger_analytics.svc/RP{{GLAccountsLineItems_ReportID}}QueryResults?$inlinecount=allpages&$select=CGLACCT,TGLACCT,CPOSTING_DATE,CFISCYEAR,CFISCPER,CACC_DOC_UUID,CACC_DOC_IT_UUID,TACCDOCTYPE,FCDEBIT_CURRCOMP,FCCREDIT_CURRCOMP&$filter=PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and ( PARA_FISCYEARPER ge 52016 and PARA_FISCYEARPER le 72016 ) and ( PARA_POSTDAT ge datetime'2016-06-25T00:00:00' and PARA_POSTDAT le datetime'2016-07-04T00:00:00' )&$top=1000&$format=json

query.value: PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and ( PARA_FISCYEARPER ge 52016 and PARA_FISCYEARPER le 72016 ) and ( PARA_POSTDAT ge datetime'2016-06-25T00:00:00' and PARA_POSTDAT le datetime'2016-07-04T00:00:00' )

item.name: G/L Accounts - Line Items | General Ledger Line Items - Invoices

url.raw: https://{{TenantHostname}}/sap/byd/odata/fin_generalledger_analytics.svc/RP{{GLAccountsLineItems_ReportID}}QueryResults?$inlinecount=allpages&$select=TACCDOCTYPE,CPROFITCTR_UUID,TPROFITCTR_UUID,COEDREF_F_ID,COEIREF_F_ID,FCDEBIT_CURRCOMP,FCCREDIT_CURRCOMP&$filter=PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and PARA_JOURNAL_ENTRY_TYPE eq '00025' and PARA_FISCYEARPER eq 62016 and PARA_POSTDAT ge datetime'2016-06-15T00:00:00'&$top=100000&$format=json

query.value: PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and PARA_JOURNAL_ENTRY_TYPE eq '00025' and PARA_FISCYEARPER eq 62016 and PARA_POSTDAT ge datetime'2016-06-15T00:00:00'

item.name: Get due items by posting date

exec: // Set key date to filter account receivables open items

url.raw: https://{{TenantHostname}}/sap/byd/odata/fin_receivablesar_analytics.svc/RP{{AccountsReceivableOpenItems_ReportID}}QueryResults?$inlinecount=allpages&$top=100&$format=json&$select=CBUS_PART_UUID,TBUS_PART_UUID,FCCRL_CURRLIT,CCOMPANY_UUID,TCOMPANY_UUID,CIM_DUN_LEVEL,CSP_CDT_M_DATE,CSP_CDT_F_DATE,FCOPEN_CURRLIT,CFISCAL_YEAR_ID,CACC_PERIOD_ID,CPOSTING_DATE,COED_PARTNER_C,COED_REF_F_ID,COED_OBJ_TC_C,TOED_OBJ_TC_C,COED_CREA_DATE,CIM_OP_IT_STAT,TIM_OP_IT_STAT,KCCRL_CURRLIT,KCOPEN_CURRLIT,RCOPEN_CURRLIT&$filter=PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and PARA_IM_SUB_TYPE_C eq '1' and PARA_KEYDATE eq datetime'{{TodayDateTime}}' and COED_PARTNER_C eq '*'&$orderby=COED_PARTNER_C desc

query.value: PARA_COMPANY eq '1000' and PARA_SETOFBKS eq '7000' and PARA_IM_SUB_TYPE_C eq '1' and PARA_KEYDATE eq datetime'{{TodayDateTime}}' and COED_PARTNER_C eq '*'

item.name: Get Employee Lifecycle Events by key date

exec: // Set key date to filter account receivables open items

url.raw: https://{{TenantHostname}}/sap/byd/odata/fin_receivablesar_analytics.svc/RPHCMPAU01_Q1001QueryResults?$inlinecount=allpages&$top=100&$format=json&$select=CEMPLOYEE_UUID,TEMPLOYEE_UUID,TRLU_UUID,TCCENTER_UUID,TJOB_UUID,KCCOUNT&$filter=PARA_COMPANY_UUID eq '1000' and (PARA_KEYDATE ge datetime'{{TodayDateTime}}' and PARA_KEYDATE le datetime'{{PastDateTime}}' )

query.value: PARA_COMPANY_UUID eq '1000' and (PARA_KEYDATE ge datetime'{{TodayDateTime}}' and PARA_KEYDATE le datetime'{{PastDateTime}}' )

item.name: Report: Planned Working Time and Absences
Get planned absenses by key date

url.raw: https://{{TenantHostname}}/sap/byd/odata/hcm_timeadministration_analytics.svc/RPHCMRPMU01_Q1001QueryResults?$inlinecount=allpages&$select=CCOMPANY,TCOMPANY,CEMPLOYEE,TEMPLOYEE,FCGROSS_CAPACITY,KCGROSS_CAPACITY,RCGROSS_CAPACITY,UCGROSS_CAPACITY,FCVACATION,KCVACATION,RCVACATION,UCVACATION&$filter=( PARA_KEYDATE ge datetime'2021-09-01T00:00:00' and PARA_KEYDATE le datetime'2021-12-01T00:00:00' )&$top=1000&$format=json

query.value: ( PARA_KEYDATE ge datetime'2021-09-01T00:00:00' and PARA_KEYDATE le datetime'2021-12-01T00:00:00' )
